title: Animal Communicator - Best of Coast to Coast AM - 7/6/18
itunes:title: Animal Communicator - Best of Coast to Coast AM - 7/6/18
description:
Guest host Connie Willis and animal psychic Crystal Hope Reed explore her history communicating with animals, and ways humans can get messages from their pets.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com
